author: jm
msg: fix some bugs in build procedure; the '3.1.X RELEASED' commit was never working, and the website-update step had some no-ops and obscure messages in it.  backmerge some changes from 3.2.0 trunk regarding spec file updating.  update procedure to match what we're actually doing these days re the announce mail, tarball voting, and the voting requirements.  add note about new PAUSE behaviour.  adopt new means of editing the announce mail, and keeping it in SVN
